text: An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 860 is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the Lenovo Y50 Touch (59426255) 15.6" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4700HQ (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 8 GB Memory 8 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 860 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the Lenovo Y50 Touch (59426255) 15.6" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4700HQ (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 8 GB Memory 8 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

The Lenovo Y50 Touch (59426255) 15.6" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4700HQ (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 8 GB Memory 8 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Call of Duty: Warzone, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Lenovo Y50 Touch (59426255) 15.6" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4700HQ (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 8 GB Memory 8 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Lenovo Y50 Touch (59426255) 15.6" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4700HQ (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 8 GB Memory 8 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Apex Legends, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
